data.message: My kids love Coke, but I've cut right down on it and switched to cans rather than the less-recyclable plastic bottles. Other drinks manufacturers handle 100% recycled plastic, why can't you?

replies.message: Hi Aidan, we’d like to use more but there’s not enough recycled plastic in the UK at the moment, we need more bottles recycled.

Coca-Cola That's a load of rubbish! perhaps you could actually arrange to pick it up from people after they've finished with the bottle. The reason you don't use recycled plastic is because you want them crystal clear and recycled plastic makes the bottle a bit cloudy. Wow. To think this over rides all the damage you're doing to the ocean environment! Shame on you lying to your customers like that!
